meanings.sent1: The poloists rode their horses skillfully during the match.
meanings.sent2: The poloists gathered at the field for their weekly game.
meanings.sent3: The poloists decided to play polo underwater for a change.
meanings.sent4: The poloists were like knights on horseback, charging towards victory.
meanings.sent5: The image of the poloists in their elegant attire stayed with the spectators long after the game ended.

meanings.definition: The group of people who play polo.
meanings.sent1: A large crowd cheered for the poloists at the championship.
meanings.sent2: The poloists celebrated their win with a grand party.
meanings.sent3: The poloists formed a band and played music between matches.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the poloists was as strong as the bond between teammates.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the poloists to their sport was truly inspiring to all who watched.
